name: Practicum in Qualitative Research Methods
description: This course provides students with hands-on experience conducting qualitative research. Each student will design and carry out a research project. Students will select their own research questions, review the relevant sociological literature, develop a research design, and conduct qualitative research, analyze, write up and present their findings.This course has been designated an Applied Writing Skills Course.
prerequisites: [10.0 credits including [(SOCA01H3) and (SOCA02H3) or SOCA03Y3] and SOCB05H3] and a cumulative GPA of at least 2.3
